text: rakhunok misyatsiv, do BOHA pikluyetʹsya, ye dvanadtsyatʹ. Tse ye BOZHYM zakonom, z dnya Vin utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu. Chotyry z nykh svyashchenni. Tse yavlyaye soboyu doskonalu relihiyu; vy ne budete obrazyty vashi dushi (boryuchysʹ) pid chas Svyashchennykh Misyatsiv. Ale, vy mozhete zayavyty vsyu viynu proty idola worshipers (navitʹ pid chas Svyashchennykh Misyatsiv), koly vony zayavlyayutʹ vsyu viynu proty vas, ta znayete shcho BOH ye na storoni spravedlyviy
